message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if you want to play a bit more.
I think you were too generous in round 1. I'll take a slightly smaller share this time.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's go with 60/40 this time. I'm still feeling the effects of that inflation!
You're not budging, I'll take a bigger share this time. You can't keep making me wait!
This inflation is killing me!  Let's settle for a 45/55 split to end this.  I can't afford to keep playing!
